subject: RE: [junit] Support for Swing and Applets ???
msgSnippet: Why would you use HttpUnit to test a swing interface or an applet? Surely you ve read the documentation as to how it works. Anand, you ve been using Junit long
messageBody:
Why would you use HttpUnit to test a swing interface or an applet?
Surely you've read the documentation as to how it works.

Anand, you've been using Junit long enough to know that it is a very
simple framework for testing any java class. That can mean testing user
interfaces, although it often get's a bit tricky. If you can think of
something to assert on then you can use Junit.

Dave

-----Original Message-----
From: anand_73@... [mailto:anand_73@...]
Sent: 28 August 2001 11:12
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Support for Swing and Applets ???


Can I test Swing UI and Applets using Httpunit or Junit ?

Thanks
Anand
